row.name: Blinded
row.comment: You’re unable to see.

row.name: Broken
row.comment: This item can’t be used for its normal function until repaired.

row.name: Clumsy
row.comment: You can’t move as easily or gracefully as usual.

row.name: Concealed
row.comment: Fog or similar obscuration makes you difficult to see and target.

This condition protects a creature if it’s in mist, within dim light, or amid something else that obscures sight but does not provide a physical barrier to effects. An effect or type of terrain that describes an area of concealment makes all creatures within it concealed.

row.name: Confused
row.comment: You attack indiscriminately.

row.name: Controlled
row.comment: Another creature determines your actions.

row.name: Dazzled
row.comment: Everything is concealed to you.

row.name: Deafened
row.comment: You’re unable to hear.

row.name: Doomed
row.comment: With your soul in peril, you are now closer to death.
Your life is ebbing away, bringing you ever closer to death. Some powerful spells and evil creatures can inflict the doomed condition on you.

row.name: Drained
row.comment: Blood loss or something similar has leached your vitality.

row.name: Dying
row.comment: You’re slipping closer to death.
You're bleeding out or otherwise at death's door. While you have this condition, you are unconscious.

row.name: Encumbered
row.comment: You’re carrying more weight than you can manage.

row.name: Enfeebled
row.comment: Your strength has been sapped away.

row.name: Fascinated
row.comment: You are compelled to focus your attention on something.

row.name: Fatigued
row.comment: Your defenses are lower and you can’t use exploration activities while traveling.

row.name: Flat-Footed
row.comment: You’re unable to defend yourself to your full capability.

row.name: Fleeing
row.comment: You must run away.

row.name: Friendly
row.comment: An NPC with this condition has a good attitude toward you.

row.name: Frightened
row.comment: Fear makes you less capable of attacking and defending.

row.name: Grabbed
row.comment: A creature, object, or magic holds you in place.

row.name: Helpful
row.comment: An NPC with this condition wants to assist you.

row.name: Hidden
row.comment: A creature you’re hidden from knows your location but can’t see you.
A creature that’s hidden is only barely perceptible. You know what space a hidden creature occupies, but little else.

activates.prereq: on target, relative to hidden creature

row.name: Hostile
row.comment: An NPC with this condition wants to harm you.

row.name: Immobilized
row.comment: You can’t move.

row.name: Indifferent
row.comment: An NPC with this condition doesn’t have a strong opinion about you.

row.name: Invisible
row.comment: Creatures can’t see you.
A creature with the invisible condition is automatically undetected to any creatures relying on sight as their only precise sense. Precise senses other than sight ignore the invisible condition.

row.name: Observed
row.comment: You’re in plain view.

row.name: Paralyzed
row.comment: Your body is frozen in place.

row.name: Persistent Damage
row.comment: You keep taking damage every round.

row.name: Petrified
row.comment: You’ve been turned to stone.

row.name: Prone
row.comment: You’re lying on the ground and easier to attack.

row.name: Quickened
row.comment: You get an extra action each turn.

row.name: Restrained
row.comment: You’re tied up and can’t move, or a grappling creature has you pinned.

row.name: Sickened
row.comment: You’re sick to your stomach.

row.name: Slowed
row.comment: You lose actions each turn.

row.name: Stunned
row.comment: You can’t use actions.

row.name: Stupefied
row.comment: You can’t access your full mental faculties, and you have trouble casting spells.

row.name: Unconscious
row.comment: You’re asleep or knocked out. You can't act
row.duration: restful night's sleep or effect's duration

row.name: Undetected
row.comment: A creature you’re undetected by doesn’t know where you are.
If a creature is undetected, you don’t know what space it occupies, you’re flat-footed to it, and you can’t easily target it.

row.name: Unfriendly
row.comment: An NPC with this condition doesn’t like you.

row.name: Unnoticed
row.comment: A creature is entirely unaware you’re present.

row.name: Wounded
row.comment: You’ve been brought back from the brink of death but haven’t fully recovered.
You have been seriously injured during a fight.

row.name: Dead
row.comment: After you die, you can't act or regain actions, can't be affected by spells that target living creatures, and for all other purposes you are an object.

row.name: Temporary hit points
row.comment: Some spells or abilities give you temporary hit points for a limited duration. You can have temporary hit points from only one source at time.
